attributes.action: Ensure that cable television is made available in more areas
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I have lived in several locations over the past 16 years, and I have only been fortunate enough to have cable at one of those locations.  At most, I have been stuck with BT as the telephone supplier and Sky for the Television; even with CPS, you still have to pay BT line rental. With wider coverage for cable (telewest & NTL) more people will access to the cheaper alternative for TV, Telephone and Internet.
